content: वा {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} As an alternative conjunction it means ‘or’; but its position is different in Sanskrit, being used either with each word or assertion or only with the last, but it is never used at the beginning of a clause; <ab>cf.</ab> च. {@--2@} It has also the following senses:-- ({%a%}) and, as well as, also; वायुर्वा दहनो वा <ls>G. M.</ls>; अस्ति ते माता स्मरसि वा तातं <ls>U. 4.</ls> ({%b%}) like, as; जातां मन्ये तुहिनमथितां पद्मिनिं वान्यरूपां <ls>Me. 83</ls>; मणी वोष्ट्रस्य लंबेते <ls>Sk.</ls>; हृष्टो गर्जति चातिदर्पितबलो दुर्वोधनो वा शिखी <ls>Mk. 5. 6</ls>; स्नानीयवस्त्रक्रियया पत्रोर्णं वोपयुज्यते <ls>M. 5. 12</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 63</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">4. 35</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">7. 64</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 13.</ls> ({%c%}) optionally; (in this sense mostly in grammatical rules, as of Pāṇini); दोषो णौ वा चित्तविरागे <ls>P. VI. 4. 99.</ls> <ls n="P. VI. 4.">91.</ls> ({%d%}) Possibility; (in this sense वा is usually added to the interrogative pronoun and its derivatives like इव or नाम), and may be translated by ‘possibly’, ‘I should like to know’; कस्य वान्यस्य वचसि मया स्थातव्यं <ls>K.</ls>; परिवर्तिनि संसारे मृतः को वा न जायते <ls>Pt. 1. 27.</ls> ({%e%}) Sometimes used merely as an expletive. ({%f%}) Indeed, truly. ({%g%}) Only. {@--3@} When repeated वा has the sense of ‘eitheror,’ ‘whether-or’; सा वा शंभोस्तदीया वा मूर्तिर्जलमयी मम <ls>Ku. 2. 60</ls>; तत्र परिश्रमानुरोधाद्वा उत्तामकथावस्तुगौरवाद्वा नवनाटकदर्शनकुतूहलाद्वा भवद्धिरवधानं दीयमानं प्रार्थये <ls>V. 1.</ls> (अथवा or, or rather, or else; see under अथ; न वा not, neither, nor; यदि वा or if; यद्वा or, or else; किं वा whether &c.).

वा {vI.v} {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (वाति, वात or वान) {@--1@} To blow; वाता वाता दिशि दिशि न वा सप्तधा सप्तभिन्नाः <ls>Ve. 3. 6</ls>; दिशः प्रसेदुर्मरुतो ववुः सुखाः <ls>R. 3. 14</ls>; <ls>Me. 42</ls>; <ls>Bk. 7. 1</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 7.">8</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 7.">61.</ls> {@--2@} To go, move. {@--3@} To strike, hurt, injure. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (वापयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to blow. {@--2@} (वाजयति-ते) To shake. --WITH आ to blow; बद्धां बद्धां भित्तिशंकाममुष्मिन्नावानावान्मातरिश्वा निहंति <ls>Ki. 5. 36</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 97.</ls> --प्र, --वि to blow; वायुर्विवाति हृदयानि हरन्नराणां <ls>Rs. 6. 23.</ls> {vII.v} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (वायति) {@--1@} To be dried up, to dry. {@--2@} To be extinguished. {vIII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (वापयति-ते) {@--1@} To go, move. {@--2@} To be happy. {@--3@} To worship, reverence.
